summary: Lex Luthor is frozen during a battle with the Justice League. He thaws out in the 31st century, discovers Time Trapper and prevents Superman's arrival to Earth as a baby. Future teen heroes Karate Kid and Dawnstar must stop him.
cast: Diedrich Bader|Laura Bailey|Dante Basco|Corey Burton|Grey Griffin|Jack De Sena|Michael Donovan|Tom Gibis|Peter Jessop|Erica Luttrell|Liam O'Brien|Kevin Michael Richardson|Jason Spisak|Fred Tatasciore|Avery Kidd Waddell|Travis Willingham
keywords: based on comic book|dc comics|jla|superhero team|superhero
title: JLA Adventures: Trapped in Time
